channel.title: RS500.blog
channel.description: Blogging the 500 Greatest Albums of All Time

item.title: At Newport 1960
item.description: Thoughts about the 'At Newport 1960' album, by Muddy Waters, released in 1960 and ranked at #348.

item.description: Thoughts about the 'Rust Never Sleeps' album, by Neil Young, released in 1979 and ranked at #351.

item.description: Thoughts about the 'Brothers In Arms' album, by Dire Straits, released in 1985 and ranked at #352.

item.description: Thoughts about the 'My Beautiful Dark Twisted Fantasy' album, by Kanye West, released in 2010 and ranked at #353.

item.title: 52nd Street
item.description: Thoughts about the '52nd Street' album, by Billy Joel, released in 1978 and ranked at #354.

item.title: Having a Rave Up With the Yardbirds
item.description: Thoughts about the 'Having a Rave Up With the Yardbirds' album, by The Yardbirds, released in 1965 and ranked at #355.

item.description: Thoughts about the '12 Songs' album, by Randy Newman, released in 1970 and ranked at #356.

item.description: Thoughts about the 'Between the Buttons' album, by The Rolling Stones, released in 1967 and ranked at #357.
